issue.message: JCenter Maven repository is no longer receiving updates: newer library versions may be available elsewhere
JCenter Maven repository is no longer receiving updates: newer library versions may be available elsewhere
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.
If you need access to FINE location, you must request both `ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION` and `ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION`
A newer version of androidx.appcompat:appcompat than 1.3.1 is available: 1.6.1
A newer version of androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout than 2.1.1 is available: 2.1.4
A newer version of androidx.test.ext:junit than 1.1.2 is available: 1.1.5
A newer version of androidx.test:rules than 1.3.0 is available: 1.5.0
A newer version of androidx.test:runner than 1.3.0 is available: 1.5.2
A newer version of com.google.android.material:material than 1.4.0 is available: 1.11.0
A newer version of junit:junit than 4.13 is available: 4.13.2
Use robolectric version 4.2.1 or later to fix issues with parsing of Windows paths
Avoid using + in version numbers; can lead to unpredictable and unrepeatable builds (org.mockito:mockito-core:3.+)

The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
This folder configuration (`v23`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 32. Merge all the resources in this folder into `values`.
The resource `R.style.Base_Theme_CookingApplianceM63KA` appears to be unused
The resource `R.style.Theme_CookingApplianceM63KA` appears to be unused
The resource `R.style.BaseTheme` appears to be unused
Should explicitly set `android:icon`, there is no default
